org.gvsig.raster.swing.basepanel

Class AbstractButtonsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.gvsig.raster.swing.basepanel.AbstractButtonsPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CellSizeDialog, GeorefLauncherPanel, GeorefOptionsPanel, LayerNameDialog, MainWindow, RasterProjectionActionsPanel, SummaryProcessPanel, WritableFolderPanel

    public abstract class AbstractButtonsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    AbstractButtonsPanel is a panel which inherits of JPanel. That reimplemented panel permits add generic buttons of apply, accept and cancel to a panel.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
